Generation IX.Scarlet: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon that eat metal.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon pounds iron scraps together to make a hammer. It will remake the hammer again and again until it's satisfied with the result.
